item.title: Best Use of Flash
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: I can't remember whose blog I spotted this on now, but it really is so delightful I have to pass it on. Not only can you click on each of those little spots and see the beautiful snowflake created by someone in the world, you can create your own unique snowflake in the easiest flash user interface I have *ever* encountered. It will make you want to make hot cocoa.
